name: Space Intruder, LD42 Game
description:
Space Intruder is a game where you have a pretty simple objective, survive and kill the boss, but it won't be easy :P

Controls:

WASD/ZQSD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Shoot
Right Click - Dash
Maj - Slow Motion
Bomb - Space
Esc - Pause

Programs:

Construct 3
Aseprite
Bfxr
Fruity Loops
